description: BitbucketWebHookCause has information about a Bitbucket webhook that triggered a build.

revision.description: SourceRevision is the revision or commit information from the source for the build

git.description: GitSourceRevision is the commit information from a git source for a build

author.description: SourceControlUser defines the identity of a user of source control

email.description: email of the source control user

name.description: name of the source control user

commit.description: commit is the commit hash identifying a specific commit

committer.description: SourceControlUser defines the identity of a user of source control

email.description: email of the source control user

name.description: name of the source control user

message.description: message is the description of a specific commit

type.description: type of the build source, may be one of 'Source', 'Dockerfile', 'Binary', or 'Images'

secret.description: Secret is the obfuscated webhook secret that triggered a build.
